OCD.name: Flow Terminator
OCD.description: Controls passing or blocking of objects based on the detection of a specific State. Only non-State objects are passed.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Consumed Information and Control scopes
AD.description: Names of the scopes containing information and triggering State objects to consume. Only the information (non State traffic) will be passed through when flow is unterminated. (Use full scope names)

AD.name: Flow Terminator State Name
AD.description: The name of the state that terminates information flow.

AD.name: Flow Terminator State Value
AD.description: The value of the state that terminates information flow.

AD.name: Information Producer scope
AD.description: The scope containing information flowing from the information consumbable scope . (Use full scope names)

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.
